trends: There have been no other sightings in Davis
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my grandmas i was swimming with my friend and my friend pointed out a hovering object triangular with flashing lights.I thought it was a helicopter at first bust it started flashing different color lights red blue white green yellow orange.It was triangular with flashing lights.It was hovering making a swishing noise.I was scared I ran inside drenched with water.It vanished into the distance.
